basics.name: John Walley
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Senior software engineer with deep experience building data-intensive and performance-critical web applications, specialising in data visualisation and complex UI systems. Strong background in TypeScript, React, and modern frontend architecture, with a track record of designing maintainable systems, improving developer experience, and tackling hard technical problems. Comfortable operating as a senior individual contributor, influencing technical direction, mentoring engineers, and collaborating closely with product and design to deliver high-quality outcomes.

work.name: Cambridge Intelligence
work.summary: Senior engineer working on high-performance data visualisation tools used by analysts to explore complex graph, temporal and geospatial data. Contributing across product architecture, developer experience, and performance-critical UI components.

work.name: Mulberry House Software
highlights: Designed and delivered data-driven web applications and visualisation tools across multiple industries.
Built a production floor-planning application in collaboration with [Reno](https://www.renovatewithreno.co.uk/), a UK home-renovation startup.
Designed visualisation tools for the pensions industry in partnership with [Financial Canvas](https://www.financialcanvas.co.uk/).

Created and maintained open-source data-visualisation libraries ([Allotment](https://allotment.mulberryhousesoftware.com/) and [Pennant](https://pennant.vega.xyz/)) with 80,000+ weekly downloads, used by the [Vega](https://vega.xyz/) decentralised derivatives trading network.
Founded and grew a consultancy, leading technical delivery while remaining hands-on with architecture and implementation.

work.name: Redgate
highlights: Improved visibility and adoption of a newly acquired database deployment tool.
Introduced in-product analytics to support data-driven product decisions.
Worked closely with UX and engineering to prioritise features and improve user experience.

work.name: Redgate
work.summary: Developed solutions to streamline SQL Server database deployment for users of popular release management tools.

work.name: Sungard
highlights: Contributed to a scalable framework powering a high-performance risk analytics service.
Developed a tracing just-in-time compiler enabling C# financial models to run efficiently on GPUs.

work.name: Earlier Career
work.summary: Held technical roles spanning high-performance computing, applied research, and customer-facing engineering, including:
highlights: Application Engineer at [MathWorks](https://www.mathworks.com/) (UK technical contact for parallel computing tools)
Research Scientist at [QinetiQ](https://www.qinetiq.com/), working on multi-sensor fusion, object tracking, and stealth technology
